nodes.text: Kenth Leesha was an individual who worked with the Imperial governor Everi Chalis sometime by the year 3 ABY. During that time, Leesha also crossed paths with Captain Tabor Seitaron among meetings and receptions on the planet Coruscant.

After Chalis defected to the Alliance to Restore the Republic in 3 ABY, Prelate Verge was tasked with hunting her down and enlisted the help of Seitaron. Seitaron, however, recommended Leesha and the Imperial Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod to the young Prelate, knowing that both had not yet retired. While Seitaron suggested that Leesha and Jerjerrod would be of more use than he would, Verge nevertheless convinced the captain to join him in his hunt for Chalis.
Kenth Leesha was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
